simplified: 师父领进门，修行在个人

pronunciation.pinyin: shī fu lǐng jìn mén , xiū xíng zài gè rén
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: shi1 fu5 ling3 jin4 men2 , xiu1 xing2 zai4 ge4 ren2

details.simplified: 师父领进门，修行在个人
details.traditional: 師父領進門，修行在個人

meanings.value: the master leads you to the door, the rest is up to you
you can lead a horse to water but you can't make him drink
